about_the_game: All Weapon Skins DLC includes weapon skins colors and camos for all guns. The skins included in this DLC pack are default, black, blue, red, green, orange, yellow, pink, purple, jungle camo, snow camo, desert camo, digital urban camo, digital jungle camo, digital pink camo, tactical desert camo, tactical forest camo, red tiger camo, blue tiger camo, yellow tiger camo, pink tiger camo, weed camo, and rainbow camo. The skin you choose from the edit loadout menu will apply the skin to the main gun and its attachment parts.
detailed_description: All Weapon Skins DLC includes weapon skins colors and camos for all guns. The skins included in this DLC pack are default, black, blue, red, green, orange, yellow, pink, purple, jungle camo, snow camo, desert camo, digital urban camo, digital jungle camo, digital pink camo, tactical desert camo, tactical forest camo, red tiger camo, blue tiger camo, yellow tiger camo, pink tiger camo, weed camo, and rainbow camo. The skin you choose from the edit loadout menu will apply the skin to the main gun and its attachment parts.
name: Full-On Paintball - All Weapon Skins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3 (32-bit only)
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: A graphics card with shader model 3.0 support.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz multi-core processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 8000 series or higher graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
